summary: Completed comprehensive testing of mosque display signage system. All backend APIs (14/14) and frontend features working perfectly. Both 4K TV display view and mobile admin panel fully functional with real-time updates, prayer time calculations, and content management.
passed_tests: Prayer times calculation API with all 7 times (Fajr, Imsya, Syuruq, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, Isha)
Real-time countdown to next prayer (DHUHR) with accurate timing
Iqomah times calculation based on configurable delays
Settings CRUD operations (mosque location, calculation method, delays, theme)
Announcements CRUD with ticker marquee animation
Quran verses CRUD with rotation display
Financial reports CRUD with proper formatting
4K TV display view with dark theme and optimal layout
Mobile admin panel with touch-optimized interface
